jd: Greetings, We have the below requirement with our Client. Kindly go through the JD below and let me know your interest. Position: Senior Python Developer Location: Fremont CA - Onsite – Need Locals Only Duration: Long Term Contract Need USC, H1B & H4 EAD candidates only. LinkedIn & Passport Number Must for Submission. Need 10+ years’ experience Job Description :- Long term contract and have to go 3 days onsite Advanced Level experience (8+ years) with Python programming language handling Big Data Experience with Django and/or Flask Experience with PySpark Experience with implementing Data Science algorithms Experience with data munging/wrangling would be good to have Experience using third-party Python libraries including Pandas, Pyarrow, Numpy, etc. Experience with ML libraries like scikit-learn Experience developing REST APIs involving large volume data sets Experience with RDBMS systems. Experience with NoSQL stores (HBase, Cassandra etc.). Rigor in high quality code, automated testing, and other engineering best practices, ability to write reusable code components. This role requires partnering continuously with many stakeholders and global teams daily to stay focused on common goals. This includes coordinating with internal and external teams (onsite/offshore) as necessary.
